infotext.eventtext.commsrelay.monster: Estás recibiendo una extraña señal de radio, podría valer la pena investigar...
infotext.eventtext.commsrelay.monster.answer: Alaridos llamativos hacen eco en el casco, algo debe estar emitiendo esas extrañas señales.
Chillidos estremecedores provocan escalofríos por toda tu espina dorsal, algo debe estar emitiendo esas extrañas señales.
infotext.eventtext.commsrelay.wreck: Estás recibiendo una señal de socorro automática, podría valer la pena investigar...
infotext.eventtext.commsrelay.wreck.answer: Estas recibiendo una transmisión de SOS de algún lugar cercano a tu localización.
infotext.eventtext.commsrelay.ruin: Estás recibiendo una señal alienigena, podría valer la pena investigar...
infotext.eventtext.commsrelay.ruin.answer: Un misterioso y constante silbido despierta un profundo temor, algo debe estar emitiendo esas extrañas señales.
infotext.eventtext.commsrelay.closetosignal: La extraña señal de radio se vuelve más fuerte, tiene que estar cerca...
infotext.eventtext.factionseparatist.meltdown: El reactor está pandeando y silbando vapor a presión, ¿Qué haces?
infotext.eventtext.factionseparatist.meltdown.opt: El metal del reactor vibra, pero oyes que el silbato de vapor fuera del núcleo. Parece que alguien le conectó algo...
El reactor burbujea mientras el vapor hincha las mangueras que salen del núcleo, parece que hace falta un ingeniero cualificado aquí.
infotext.eventtext.factionseparatist.smellofsulfu: El olor a azufre quema tus fosas nasales...
infotext.eventtext.factionseparatist.hiddenstash: Oculto en las paredes, notas el tenue brillo de una pequeña caja metalica.
Encuentras una nota oculta en un detonador con instrucciones detalladas de lo que hace falta hacerse por la democracia.
infotext.eventtext.factionstowaway.separatist: Un tosco luchador de la libertad salta de la caja, mientras sacude salvajemente un arma de fuego.
infotext.eventtext.factionstowaway.coalition.good: Parece que el cargamento de otro capitán fue incorrectamente enviado aquí. ¡Genial!
infotext.eventtext.factionstowaway.coalition.bad: La caja contenía una pequeña carta con un sello de la coalición. La carta es en realidad una multa, vaya suerte.
infotext.eventtext.factionstowaway.cultist: La peste a carne podrida da lugar a un oxidado traje de buceo que comienza a pararse fuera de la caja por su propia cuenta.
infotext.eventtext.factionstowaway.clown: Un sonriente harlequín saluda tu mirada con una ruin mueca, baba cae de debajo de su máscara.
infotext.eventtext.cocivtransport.interact: Te acercas a un civil aparentemente asustado.¿Que haces?
infotext.eventtext.cocivtransport.option.rob: "¡O me das todo tu dinero o tú no sales de aquí con vida!"
infotext.eventtext.cocivtransport.option.rob.answ: "Bueno bueno... ¡Eso es todo lo que tengo!"
infotext.eventtext.cocivtransport.option.hire: "¡Únete a nosotros o muere como el resto!"
infotext.eventtext.cocivtransport.option.hire.suc: "¡Está bien! Haré lo que sea, ¡Pero no me hagas daño!"
infotext.eventtext.cocivtransport.option.hire.fai: "¡Prefiero morir antes que unirme a unos inmundos piratas!"
infotext.eventtext.jobboardde.interact: Una serie de folletos decoran la pared, cada uno con una recompensa. ¿Cuál tomas?
infotext.eventtext.jobboardde.option.piratemissio: -RECOMPENSAS DISPONIBLES PARA CAZADORES DE PIRATAS LOCALES-
Piensas en tu cabeza: "La coalición de verdad necesita gente que ensucie sus manos para ellos en secreto."
infotext.eventtext.jobboardde.option.monstermissi: -FAUNA LOCAL CAUSANDO ESTRAGOS - PAGAMOS POR SU MUERTE-
Piensas en tu cabeza: "Alguien tiene que acabar con esas peligrosas criaturas."
infotext.eventtext.jobboardde.option.miningmissio: -CUEVA LOCAL PUEDE CONTENER DEPOSITOS MINERALES - PAGAMOS POR UNA PRUEBA DE SU EXISTENCIA-
Piensas en tu cabeza: "Un poco de trabajo minero honesto, ¿Qué podría ir mal?"
infotext.eventtext.jobboardde.option.cargomission: Piensas en tu cabeza: "Para ser honestos, ¡Me importan tres mierdas los límites de velocidad!"
infotext.eventtext.jobboardde.option.salvagemissi: -UNA SEÑAL HA APARECIDO EN UNA CUEVA LOCAL - PAGAMOS A CUALQUIERA QUE INVESTIGUE Y RECUPERE LO QUE ENCUENTRE-
Piensas en tu cabeza: "¡Seguro que habrá algo que sacar de allí abajo!"
infotext.eventtext.bartender.offerdrink.nodrunk: Parece que te hace falta un trago.
infotext.eventtext.bartender.offerdrink.slightdru: Parece que te hace falta otro trago.
infotext.eventtext.bartender.buy.rum.success.nodr: Sólo tenemos edulcorante artificial, lo siento.
infotext.eventtext.bartender.buy.rum.success.slig: Tengo más de eso si quieres, para todo el día.
infotext.eventtext.bartender.buy.rum.failure: Únicamente damos crédito a locales, primero muéstrame el dinero.
infotext.eventtext.bartender.tip.success: Déjame darte algo a cambio de eso; revisa esta señal cuando desatraques, quizás haya algo de valor.
infotext.eventtext.bartender.tip.failure: Hombre, ojalá los cumplidos pagaran facturas, de todos modos gracias.
infotext.eventtext.shop.engineer.interact: "Tengo algunos materiales de sobra aquí, ¿Te interesa? ¡Aunque sólo puedes elegir uno!"
"Aún puedes sentir el aroma del fabricador en ellos."
infotext.eventtext.shop.engineer.option.extinguis: "Pues estarás en problemas si tienes un incendio."
infotext.eventtext.shop.engineer.unfriedly: "Aquí no ayudaremos a los de tu tipo."
infotext.eventtext.shop.quartermaster.interact: "Tengo un exceso de tanques de combustible, si es que necesitas reponer."
infotext.eventtext.shop.quartermaster.option.scra: "Conseguí esto de un naufragio cercano, deja que lo marque en tu mapa..."
"La chatarra de uno es el tesoro de otro, hijo. Paga el precio."
infotext.eventtext.shop.securityofficer.interact: "Tengo un exceso de munición, si es que buscas reponer, ¡Pero solo puedo venderte un paquete!"
infotext.eventtext.shop.securityofficer.option.co: Caja de munición de cañón de Gauss (150 mr)
infotext.eventtext.shop.securityofficer.option.re: "Sabes que las balas no son gratis, ¿Verdad?"
infotext.eventtext.shop.securityofficer.option.sm: "Sabes que las balas no son gratis, ¿Verdad?"
infotext.eventtext.securityofficer.bribe.option.r: "Así que lo haremos por las malas, ¿Eh?"
infotext.eventtext.securityofficer.bribe.option.l: "Tengo a un sospechoso aquí, necesito refuerzos."
infotext.eventtext.securityofficer.bribe.option.b: "Pensándolo bien, tu no eres el tipo que estaba buscando."
"¿Me estás intentando sobornar con esa miseria?"
"¿¡Que me dijiste!? ¡Archivaré un reporte si no paras!"
infotext.eventtext.pirateoutpostevent: Un pirata se detiene y te mira como si esperara algo de tí. ¿Qué haces?
infotext.eventtext.pirateoutpostevent.option.igno: No le prestas atención y sigues con tus asuntos.
infotext.eventtext.pirateoutpostevent.option.atta: Atacar (Destruir el puesto de avanzada pirata)
"De verdad me jode ver piratas inmundos... ¡Hora del control de plagas!"
Hacerlos mierda (Destruir el puesto de avanzado pirata)
infotext.eventtext.commsrelay.piratehaven: La estación está intentando establecer conección...
infotext.eventtext.commsrelay.piratehaven.answer: ¡Hey! ¿Son estúpidos? ¿Creen que no vemos quiénes atracan? ¡Pues piensen dos veces, ojetes! ¡Ustedes son de la coalición! Ni siquiera piensen en asomar un pié aquí o lo van a lamentar, ¡Idiotas! ¡Piérdanse!
infotext.eventtext.shop.piratesecurityofficer.int: "Tengo un putísimo bombazo si buscas cargarte. Te vendo un paquete que te guste."
infotext.eventtext.shop.piratesecurityofficer.opt: 6x Munición del cañón de mano (1000 mr)
"Esto atravesará cualquier armadura de la coalición, mantis, e incluso caparazón de un moloch, ¡Lo juro!."
2x Cargador del fusil de asalto (1000 mr)
"Estos están hechos con odio y cargados con intenciones oscuras. Asalta responsablemente."
"¿Acaso también llegaste de la estación abandonada? Hace falta un poco de dinero aquí."
infotext.eventtext.piratesecurityofficer.toll.low: "Ya know we don't just let everyone walk right in. There's a fuckin' toll! Word of advice: It's better to pay up!"
"¡Já! Así me gusta. ¡Sin líos! \nYou can enter, but remember: If we see you draw a weapon, you'll regret it!"
"¿Sabes qué?... Si doblas la paga, ¡Diré cositas bonitas de ustedes a las otras tripulaciones!"
"Amigo, ni siquiera tienes la lana... ¿Me estás jodiéndo? ¡Pues vete a la mierda!"
"¡Pff! Está bien... ¡Sigue chupando la bota de la coalición!"
"¿Ni siquiera tienes el dinero? Seguro tienes algo que me haga valer el tiempo."
"¿Vas en serio? Me estás jodiendo, ¿Verdad? ¡Bueno está bien! Pasa... \nAnd remember: If we see you draw a weapon while you're in there, you're dead!"
"Oh pues tengo una mejor propuesta para tí..."
"Tu lloriqueo me entretiene... No digas nada más y vete de mi vista."
"¡Tu lamentable intento de historia no te va salvar!"
infotext.eventtext.piratesecurityofficer.toll.opt: "Conozco un idioma que tú vas a entender."
infotext.eventtext.piratesecurityofficer.attack.c: ¡Agarren a esos cerdos de la coalición!
infotext.eventtext.piratesecurityofficer.toll.hig: "Oh ¿Pero qué tenemos aquí? ¿¡Inmundicia coalicionista!? ¡Ya sabes que hay un puto PEAJE! ¡Paga, tonto!"
infotext.eventtext.piratesecurityofficer.lowrep.p: "Ahora te daré una pequeña oferta. Pagame el doble y le daré buena fama a tu tripulación con las otras tripulaciones de aquí."
"Hm no esperaba que de verdad pagaras. Está bien, diré cosas buenas de ustedes. A la coalición no le gustará oír esas cosas, jeje."
"Ustedes los coalicionistas son tontos como una roca. Ni siquiera saben contar su propio dinero. ¡Piérdanse!"
"Debí haberlo suponido. Sólo eres un leal lamebotas. ¡Vete a la mierda!"
"¿Ni siquiera tienes el dinero? Ustedes coalicionistas seguro tienen algo de interés para mi."
infotext.eventtext.piratesecurityofficer.lowrep.h: "Hazlo rápido, cerdo, o yo lo haré."
"Esperaba algo más de alguien como tú... ¡Ven aquí!"
infotext.eventtext.piratesecurityofficer.lowrep.p: "Jaja ¡Oigan chicos! ¡Miren este puto llorón!... Está bien, me hiciste reir, ¡pasa antes de que me arrepienta!"
"¿¡Me estas jodiendo!? ¡Voy a quedarme con todo lo que haya en tu puto cadáver!"
"Tu lamentable intento de historia no te va a salvar, ¡Tampoco podrán ayudarte tus amiguitos de la coalición! ¡Dí tus últimas palabras!"
infotext.eventtext.piratemissioninformant.interac: "¿Hm? ¿Dices que buscas trabajo? ¡Deja que te diga algo! ¡No hay servicio de administración aquí! Pero... Me llegó una pista de un transporte de la coalición pasando aquí cerca y no sé si mi tripulación está pronta para ello. ¡Te lo vendo a tí si tienes efectivo!"
"¡No te lo voy a dar gartis, tonto! ¡Vuelve con la lana!"
infotext.EventText.DEgotoblockade.c1: "SE EMITIDA RECOMPENSA POR LA COALICIÓN", los posters decoloridos y dañados marcan zonas de destrucción e infección, parece que la coalición esta por encima de ellos. Únicamente puedes distinguir un conjunto de coordenadas.
infotext.EventText.DEgotoblockade.o1: Una paga libre de impuestos no hace daño...
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_lair.c1: “Hay una enorme guarida rebalsando con criaturas a cada minuto, ¡Si acabas con ella hay una recompensa esperando por ti!”
infotext.entitydescription.commsrelayDE: A radio communication relay device which allows you to receive radio signals and communication.
infotext.entitydescription.giantrubberduck: Un pato de caucho gigante para tirar y ver flotar en el agua.
infotext.entitydescription.bigrubberduck: Un pato de caucho grande para tirar y ver flotar en el agua.
infotext.entitydescription.rubberduck: Un pato de caucho para tirar y ver flotar en el agua.
infotext.entitydescription.giantpiraterubberduck: Un pato de caucho gigante con un gorro pirata y un parche en el ojo para tirar y ver flotar en el agua.
infotext.entitydescription.bigpiraterubberduck: Un pato de caucho grande con un gorro pirata y un parche en el ojo para tirar y ver flotar en el agua.
infotext.entitydescription.piraterubberduck: Un pato de caucho con un gorro pirata y un parche en el ojo para tirar y ver flotar en el agua.
infotext.entitydescription.exosuitPA: Un exotraje altamente modificado. Parece que algunos piratas son ingeniosos y lograron aumentar la resistencia al aturidimento y permitir que el usuario respire el oxígeno del casco, si hay disponible.
infotext.entitydescription.exosuitplayerPA: Un exotraje altamente modificado. Parece que algunos piratas son ingeniosos y lograron aumentar la resistencia al aturidimento y permitir que el usuario respire el oxígeno del casco, si hay disponible.
infotext.entitydescription.exosuitpartsPA: Partes dañadas de un exotraje modificado pirata.
infotext.entitydescription.dirtybombPA: Una bomba radioactiva hecha a mano para poner en un detonador, cañon de riel o carga de profundidad. ¡Mejor mantener las distancias!
infotext.entitydescription.pirateclothesnovicePA: Un atuendo arrugado hecho a mano por los piratas, diseñado para resistir las duras condiciones de la vida marina en Europa. Esta prenda particular es dada a principiantes y posiciones menores.
infotext.entitydescription.pirateclothesPA: n atuendo arrugado hecho a mano por los piratas, diseñado para resistir las duras condiciones de la vida marina en Europa. Esta prenda particular ha sido modificada con una armadura de placas ligera.
infotext.entitydescription.pirateclotheshardPA: n atuendo arrugado hecho a mano por los piratas, diseñado para resistir las duras condiciones de la vida marina en Europa. Esta prenda específica es usada por tripulantes más experimentados y altos mandos para que sean protegidos durante el combate.
infotext.entityname.labelslogocoalitioncolor: Logo a color de la coalición
infotext.entityname.labelslogoseparatistscolor: Logo a color de los separatistas jovianos
infotext.entityname.labelslogoseparatistsdamaged: Logo dañado de los separatistas jovianos
infotext.entityname.labelslogoseparatistsbroken: Logo roto de los separatistas jovianos
infotext.missionname.coalition_cargo2: Asaltar una nave de cargamento de la coalición
infotext.missiondescription.coalition_cargo2: Un nave de cargamento de la coalición está pasando. ¡Elimina a su tripulación y saquea su nave!
infotext.missionsuccess.coalition_cargo2: ¡Has eliminado a la tripulación de la coalición y saqueado su nave con éxito!
infotext.missionfailure.coalition_cargo2: ¡No has matado a la tripulación de la coalición!
infotext.missionmessage0.coalition_cargo2: ¡Hora de atacar! ¡Ellos tienen el botín que tu quieres!
infotext.missionmessage1.coalition_cargo2: Saquear su buque y continuar hacia [location2].

infotext.missionmessage1.random_pirate_heavy: Resulta que la señal venía de esos piratas. ¿Habrán tenido botín a bordo? Navega tu nave a [location2] cuando estés pronto para irte.

infotext.missionsuccess.random_pirate_party: La tripulación del buque pirata ha sido eliminado exitosamente.
infotext.missionfailure.random_pirate_party: La tripulación del buque pirata no ha sido eliminada.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_pirate_party: ¡Neutraliza a la tripulación o hunde el submarino al fondo del océano!
infotext.missionmessage1.random_pirate_party: Resulta que la señal venía de esos piratas. ¿Habrán tenido botín a bordo? Navega tu nave a [location2] cuando estés pronto para irte.
infotext.missiondescription.pirate_heavy: Busca la nave que ha estado aterrorizando esta zona y elimina su tripulación, pero recuerda que esos piratas han logrado fortalezer sus cascos, ¡así que o llevas fuego pesado o apuntas a las puertas y escotillas! Los puntos marcados muestran donde ha sido avistada la nave por última vez.
infotext.missionsuccess.pirate_heavy: La tripulación del buque pirata ha sido eliminado exitosamente.
infotext.missionfailure.pirate_heavy: La tripulación del buque pirata no ha sido eliminada.
infotext.missionmessage0.pirate_heavy: ¡Neutraliza a la tripulación o hunde el submarino al fondo del océano!
infotext.missionmessage1.pirate_heavy: Navega tu submarino hacia [location2] para reclamar tu recompensa.
infotext.missiondescription.pirate_party: Hubieron avistamentos de un buque pirata atacando otros buques y robando su etanol y ron, reventando con música tan fuerte que atraen todos los monstruos de Europa a nuestras puertas. Hazte cargo de esos idiotas borrachos así no tenemos que lidiar con cosas mucho peores que ellos. Las zonas marcadas muestran donde sospechamos que la nave puede estar.
infotext.missionsuccess.pirate_party: La tripulación del buque pirata ha sido eliminado exitosamente.
infotext.missionfailure.pirate_party: La tripulación del buque pirata no ha sido eliminada.
infotext.missionmessage0.pirate_party: ¡Neutraliza a la tripulación o hunde el submarino al fondo del océano!
infotext.missionmessage1.pirate_party: Navega tu submarino hacia [location2] para reclamar tu recompensa.
infotext.missiondescription.pirate_piezo: Hemos oído rumores de una nave pirata con extrañas capacidades en esta zona. Por lo visto crean algun tipo de anomalía para protegerse a si mismos, ¡Así que querrás mantener tu submarino al margen! Las zonas marcadas es donde creemos que el submarino puede estar.
infotext.missionsuccess.pirate_piezo: La tripulación del buque pirata ha sido eliminado exitosamente.
infotext.missionfailure.pirate_piezo: La tripulación del buque pirata no ha sido eliminada.
infotext.missionmessage0.pirate_piezo: ¡Neutraliza a la tripulación o hunde el submarino al fondo del océano!
infotext.missionmessage1.pirate_piezo: Navega tu submarino hacia [location2] para reclamar tu recompensa.
infotext.missiondescription.pirate_lord: Se ha hablado sobre el búque del "Señor de los piratas" aterrorizando esta zona. ¡Elimina su tripulación y tendrás una jugosa recompensa! ¡Pero recuerda que es el buque del "Señor de los piratas"! ¡Tienen un casco muy fuerte y tienen armas pesadas así que preparate! Las zonas marcadas es donde la nave ha sido avistada por última vez.
infotext.missionsuccess.pirate_lord: La tripulación del buque pirata ha sido eliminado exitosamente.
infotext.missionfailure.pirate_lord: La tripulación del buque pirata no ha sido eliminada.
infotext.missionmessage0.pirate_lord: ¡Neutraliza a la tripulación o hunde el submarino al fondo del océano!
infotext.missionmessage1.pirate_lord: Navega tu submarino hacia [location2] para reclamar tu recompensa.
infotext.missiondescription.crawlerlair: Los reptadores se estan anidando en [location1]. Ayúdanos a deshacernos de ellos destruyendo cualquiera de sus huevos dentro de la cueva.
infotext.missionmessage0.crawlerlair: "¡Buen trabajo! Parece que destruíste cada uno de los nidos que habían allí. Abandona la zona y nosotros te enviaremos tu paga."
infotext.missiondescription.mudraptorlair: Los fangorraptores se están anidando en [location1]. Ayúdanos a deshacernos de ellos destruyendo cualquiera de sus huevos dentro de la cueva.
infotext.missionmessage0.mudraptorlair: "¡Buen trabajo! Parece que destruíste cada uno de los nidos que habían allí. Abandona la zona y nosotros te enviaremos tu paga."
infotext.missiondescription.thresherlair: Los azotadores se están anidando en [location1]. Ayúdanos a deshacernos de ellos destruyendo cualquiera de sus huevos dentro de la cueva.
infotext.missionmessage0.thresherlair: "¡Buen trabajo! Parece que destruíste cada uno de los nidos que habían allí. Abandona la zona y nosotros te enviaremos tu paga."
infotext.missionname.huskcrawlerlair: Guarida de reptadores con parásitos vaina.
infotext.missiondescription.huskcrawlerlair: Reptadores emparasitados se propágan rápidamente en [location1]. ¡No podemos dejar que sigan propagando! Ayúdanos a deshacernos de ellos disparando a todos los que veas en esa cueva.
infotext.missionsuccess.huskcrawlerlair: Los reptadores emparasitados han sido eliminados exitosamente.
infotext.missionmessage0.huskcrawlerlair: "Vaya, ¡buen trabajo! Parece que has matado a cada uno de ellos allí. Abandona la zona y nosotros te enviaremos tu paga."
infotext.missiondescription.wasteyard: Demasiados búques hallaron su fin en [location1] y todos sus desperdicios tóxicos derramados en el océano han transformado la fauna local en criaturas muy peligrosas. ¡No podemos dejar que esta plaga continúe propagándose! Ayúdanos a deshacernos de ellos matando y destruyendo cualquier huevo de criatura que encuentres en ese basurero.
infotext.missionmessage0.wasteyard: "¡No creí que ibas a salir con vida de allí! Parece que acabaste con ellos. Abandona la zona y nosotros te enviaremos tu paga."

infotext.locationdescription.Lair: La fauna local se propaga rápidamente a localizaciones cercanas.
infotext.locationdescription.HuskgroundsDE: Un sitio de alta actividad de fauna local, infectado con el parásito de vainas propagándose rápidamente.
infotext.locationdescription.WasteyardDE: Un sitio de alta actividad de fauna local, infectado con residuos propagándose rápidament.
infotext.locationdescription.waypoint: Una sitio limpio de fauna y obstáculos, pronto para ser colonizado.
infotext.locationdescription.PirateNone: Los piratas están desarmando el puesto de avanzada abandonado para construir un paraíso de sus restos.
infotext.locationchange.construction.changeto.set: Las construcciones de nuevos asentamientos en [previousname] terminaron. Más colonos se mudan a sus nuevos hogares.
infotext.locationchange.survey.changeto.extractio: Los estudios de [previousname] mostraron la presencia de un depósito de minerales y están comenzando las excavaciones.
infotext.locationchange.hydroponics.changeto.bios: Los cultivos hidropónicos de [previousname] mejoraron sus instalaciones en una biósfera para producir carne suficiente para las estaciones cercanas.
infotext.locationchange.abandoned.changeto.pirate: Los piratas están desarmando el puesto de avanzada abandonado para construir un paraíso de sus restos.
infotext.locationchange.biosphere.changeto.nouris: La biosfera en [previousname] ha sido mejorada exitosamente a una instalación de alimentación.
infotext.locationchange.study.changeto.lab: Los estudios en [previousname] fueron concluídos y la instalación ha sido mejorada a un laboratorio de investigación.
infotext.locationchange.settlement.changeto.outpo: Los colonos de [previousname] expandieron la colonia para que habite más gente.
infotext.locationchange.lab.changeto.research: Más investigadores son arrastrados hacia [previousname] y están fundando un instituto.
infotext.locationchange.excavation.changeto.mine: Las excavaciones en [previousname] finalizaron y ahora están comenzando una mina.
infotext.locationchange.hospital.changeto.surgery: El hospital en [previousname] fue exitosamente mejorado a un centro de cirugía.
infotext.locationchange.clinic.changeto.hospital: La clinica en [previousname] necesitaba más capacidad así que la mejoraron a un hospital.
infotext.locationchange.outpost.changeto.abandone: Perdimos contacto con [previousname] inesperadamente. Te advertimos que investigues con discreción.
La estación de baliza cercana a [previousname] recibió un mensaje de SOS de la estación, pero no se ha recibido más comunicación.
Informes de [previousname] indican que hostiles han invadido el puesto de avanzada. No se hallaron supervivientes.
Informes de [previousname] indican que hostiles han invadido el puesto de avanzada. Los supervivientes están siendo extraidos mediante batiscafos.
infotext.locationchange.none.changeto.waypoint: [previousname] tiene un buen espacio par establecer un puesto de avanzada.
La coalición ha marcado a [previousname] como una buena ubicación para colonizar.
infotext.locationchange.none.changeto.Huskswarm: Swarms of husk-infected monsters were spotted around [previousname].
infotext.locationchange.lair.changeto.none: [previousname] ha sido despejado por las fuerzas militares de la coalición de los alrededores.
infotext.locationchange.UnderAttack.changeto.none: [previousname] ha sido salvado de una plaga.
infotext.locationchange.UnderAttack.changeto.bloc: La coalición está colocando un bloqueo en [previousname].
La coalición está moviendo tropas a [previousname].
La coalición está guareciendo tropas en [previousname].
infotext.locationchange.colony.changeto.settlemen: Los colonos en [previousname] han expandido la colonia para que habite más gente.
infotext.locationchange.colony.changeto.construct: Los colonos en [previousname] comenzaron la construcción de una estación.
Los colonos de [previousname] comenzaron a trabajar en la creación de entretenimineto para sus habitantes.
[previousname] comenzaron con la construcción de mayor infraestructura.
infotext.locationchange.construction.changeto.hyd: Los ingenieros de [previousname] terminaron de cablear una bahía hidropónica.
Los mecánicos de [previousname] terminaron las soldaduras de una bahía hidropónica.
[previousname] comenzó a cultivar para los alrededores.
infotext.locationchange.construction.changeto.fac: Los ingenieros de [previousname] terminaron de instalar fabricadores.
Los mecánicos de [previousname] comenzaron con la producción de bienes de consumo.
infotext.locationchange.construction.changeto.cam: Las fuerzas de seguridad de la coalición comenzaron a establecer una base en [previousname].
[previousname] está siendo controlado por la coalición.
Un campamento de la coalición está siendo establecido en [previousname].
infotext.locationchange.construction.changeto.stu: Un estudio de la zona entorno a [previousname] mostró un montón de formas de vida exóticas en la región.
[previousname] descubrieron un fascinante espécimen floral creciendo en la caverna.
La flora cercana a [previousname] despierta curiosidad científica.
infotext.locationchange.construction.changeto.sur: Un estudio cercano a [previousname] mostró la presencia de minerales valiosos.
[previousname] encontró minerales alrededor de la estación.
Zonas ricas para minería fueron halladas en [previousname].
infotext.locationchange.construction.changeto.fus: Cinetíficos e ingenieros en [previousname] terminaron una planta de energía de fusión.
[previousname] ahora propociona energía de fusión a los alrededores.
La turbina refrigerante para la planta de energía de fusión en [previousname] está completa.
infotext.locationchange.construction.changeto.shi: Ingenieros y mecánicos en [previousname] comenzaron a vender submarinos y partes de submarinos.
Los astilleros de [previousname] finalizaron la construccion.
infotext.locationchange.construction.changeto.cli: Ahora hay tratamientos médicos disponibles en [previousname].
Una clínica se terminó de construir en [previousname].
infotext.locationchange.camp.changeto.base: Las fuerzas de la coalición han fortificado [previousname].
Las fuerzas de la coalición han reforzado [previousname].
infotext.locationchange.base.changeto.military: Fuerzas de la coalición han establecido una fortaleza masiva en [previousname].
Las fuerzas de la coalición se están movilizando de [previousname].
[previousname] se ha vuelto una fortaleza para defender estaciones cercanas.
Las fuerzas de la coalición han establecido una fortaleza masiva en [previousname].
Las fuerzas de la coalición se están movilizando de [previousname].
[previousname] se ha vuelto una fotaleza para defender estaciones cercanas.
infotext.locationchange.none.changeto.pirateoutpo: Los piratas establecieron un nuevo paraíso en [previousname].
Los piratas se aventuraron a [previousname] y establecieron un nuevo paraíso.
infotext.EventText.missionevent.piratevscoalition: We heard there's a coalition vessel passing by near here. Maybe they got some goods you can take, if you know what I mean?
infotext.EventText.missionevent.piratevsseparatis: Some separatists seem to be traveling around these waters. Maybe they got some goods you can take, if you know what I mean?
infotext.lockedpathtooltippirate: Pirates have found a way around the blockades to the deeper zones of Europa. Listen around the station to find out how to get past the blockades.
infotext.eventtext.unlockpatheuropanridgepirate.c: “Hm? Secret passage? Ohhh right! We found a tunnel that leads past the blockades. Here I'll show it on your map... Be careful though! There might be vessels patrolling!”
infotext.eventtext.unlockpathaphoticplateaupirate: “Oh you're here to get past the blockades? Give me your map... Alright, here's where you can find a tunnel to get past them, but be careful! There might be patrols along the way! Good luck out there!”
infotext.eventtext.unlockpathgreatseapirate.c1: “Ahoy! You're probably looking to get past the blockades, right? There's a tunnel leading past them. Here, I'll mark it on your map... Keep an eye out for patrolling vessels though!”
infotext.missiondescription.trespassing_coalition: You are trespassing. Keep an eye out for patrolling Coalition vessels in this area!
infotext.missionsuccess.trespassing_coalition: You successfully eliminated the Coalition patrol!
infotext.missionfailure.trespassing_coalition: You successfully dodged the Coalition patrol!
infotext.missionmessage0.trespassing_coalition: Escape the patrol, or neutralize the thread!
infotext.missionmessage1.trespassing_coalition: You can now continue your way towards [location2].
infotext.missiondescription.pirate_vscoalition: Hunt down the coalition vessel, eliminate their crew and loot their goods! The marked locations show where the ship might be headed.
infotext.missionsuccess.pirate_vscoalition: The coalition vessel's crew was successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionfailure.pirate_vscoalition: The coalition vessel's crew was not eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.pirate_vscoalition: ¡Neutraliza a la tripulación o hunde el submarino al fondo del océano!
infotext.missionmessage1.pirate_vscoalition: Loot their vessel and continue onwards to [location2].
infotext.missiondescription.pirate_vsseparatists: Hunt down the separatist vessel, eliminate their crew and loot their goods! The marked locations show where the ship might be headed.
infotext.missionsuccess.pirate_vsseparatists: The separatist vessel's crew was successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionfailure.pirate_vsseparatists: The separatist vessel's crew was not eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.pirate_vsseparatists: ¡Neutraliza a la tripulación o hunde el submarino al fondo del océano!
infotext.missionmessage1.pirate_vsseparatists: Loot their vessel and continue onwards to [location2].
infotext.entitydescription.he-proteinbar1: Una barrita de proteínas algo sabrosa. Ayuda a acelerar el proceso de curación ligeramente.
infotext.entitydescription.he-chips1: Frituras hechas de granada seca. Un bocadillo popular para acompañar la 'COMPETICIÓN DE DUNWICE'.
infotext.entitydescription.he-chips2: Frituras hechas de granda mutada. Un bocadillo popular. Se dice que ayuda levemente a curar las quemaduras.
infotext.entitydescription.he-cookedcrawlerfilet: El sabor es horrible, pero eso es común en Europa.
infotext.entitydescription.he-cookedhumanfilet: Sabe como a cerdo, un poco más amargo y fuerte.
infotext.entitydescription.he-rawhumansausage: No es lo que piensas. Se echa a perder si no se guarda en un contenedor refrigerado.

infotext.entitydescription.rum: Una fuerte bebida alcoholica. |Bebida alcoholica |Disminuye psicosis |Disminuye alucinaciones |Disminuye la infección de vaina (Por debajo del 90%) |Propiedades curativas |Incrementa resistencia a la psicosis
infotext.entitydescription.he-rum: Un ron muy fuerte enriquecido con uranio para más emoción. |Bebida alcoholica |Disminuye psicosis |Disminuye alucinaciones |Disminuye la infección de vaina (Por debajo del 90%) |Propiedades curativas |Incrementa resistencia a la psicosis |Incrementa levemente la enfermedad por radiación
infotext.entitydescription.he-whiskey: Whiskey original del Doctor Micheal. Aprovado por doctores a lo largo de Europa. |Bebida alcoholica |Disminuye alucinaciones |Incrementa resistencia a la psicosis

infotext.entitydescription.he-milk: Una botella de leche de Moloch. Sabe un poco extraño. ¡No preguntes cómo se ordeña un Moloch! Puede ayudar un poco cuando estas hambriento o borracho.

infotext.entitydescription.he-humanmeatchunk: Partes de un humano. Se echa a perder si no se guarda en un contenedor refrigerado.
infotext.entitydescription.he-rawhumanmeat: Se echa a perder si no se guarda en un contenedor refrigerado.
infotext.entitydescription.he-crawlermeatchunk: Un reptador cortado en dos. Se echa a perder si no se guarda en un contenedor refrigerado.
infotext.entitydescription.he-rawcrawlermeat: Se echa a perder si no se guarda en un contenedor refrigerado.
infotext.entitydescription.he-rawcrawlermeatpatty: Se echa a perder si no se guarda en un contenedor refrigerado.
infotext.entityname.he-mudraptormeatchunk: Trozo de carne crudo de fangorraptor
infotext.entitydescription.he-mudraptormeatchunk: Un buen trozo de carne cortado de un fangorraptor. Se echa a perder si no se guarda en un contenedor refrigerado.
infotext.entitydescription.he-rawmudraptormeat: Se echa a perder si no se guarda en un contenedor refrigerado.
infotext.entitydescription.he-rawmudraptorroast: ¡Hora de ponerlo en el horno! Se echa a perder si no se guarda en un contenedor refrigerado.
infotext.entityname.he-hammerheadmeatchunk: Trozo de carne de pez ariete
infotext.entitydescription.he-hammerheadmeatchunk: Un buen trozo de carne cortado de un pez ariete. Se echa a perder si no se guarda en un contenedor refrigerado.
infotext.entitydescription.he-rawhammerheadmeat: Se echa a perder si no se guarda en un contenedor refrigerado.
infotext.entitydescription.he-rawhammerheadsparer: Cortados de una caja toráxica gigantesca. Se echa a perder si no se guarda en un contenedor refrigerado.
infotext.entitydescription.he-rawhammerheadroast: ¡Hora de ponerlo en el horno!. Se echa a perder si no se guarda en un contenedor refrigerado.
infotext.entitydescription.he-hammerheadspawnmeat: Un pez martillo bebé. Se echa a perder si no se guarda en un contenedor refrigerado.
infotext.entitydescription.he-threshermeatchunk: Un buen trozo de carne cortado de un azotador. Se echa a perder si no se guarda en un contenedor refrigerado.
infotext.entitydescription.he-rawthreshermeat: Se echa a perder si no se guarda en un contenedor refrigerado.
infotext.entitydescription.he-salt: ¡Como si el agua de mar no fuese suficiente!
infotext.entitydescription.he-vinegar: No sé si huele peor que los peces...
infotext.entitydescription.he-enableneeds: [Click Der. + E] Habilita las dolencias de hambre y sed al jugador, haciendo que tenga que comer y beber regultarmente. Esto es totalmente opcional y NO para ganar las mejoras de beber y comer. Advertencia: No puede ser desactivado de tu personaje una vez lo activas. ¡NO USAR CUANDO JUEGAS CON 'NEEDS' DE 'LeDoux'!
infotext.entitydescription.he-cleaver:
¡Se acabó el tiempo! ¡Chop chop!

Puede cortar:
-Reptadores
-Fangorraptores
-Azotadores
-Pez ariete
-Crias de pez ariete
-Gusanos letales
-Humanos
infotext.entitydescription.he-skillbooktheeuropan: "... Observa detrás de la cortina del tiempo. ¿Eres tú, Robert? No, Yo soy Robert. Pero también soy Doris. Yo soy la carne. Aliméntate de mí y vuélvete uno con el gusano. ..."
infotext.entityname.he-skillbookauntdoris: EL ARTE DE LA COCINA SUBMARINA de La Tía Doris
infotext.entitydescription.he-antistarve: Usado para despertar pacientes que han perdido conciencia por hambre o sed.
infotext.entitydescription.he-chefsuniform1: ¡Usado por todos los chefs en Europa!
infotext.entitydescription.he-chefscapmaster1: ¡Sólo para la élite de la cocina!
infotext.entitydescription.he-refrigerator: Previene la putrefacción. Sólo puede usarse para bebidas y aliemntos. Necesita energía.
infotext.afflictiondescription.he-hunger.other.lo: El paciente comienza a tener un poco de apetito.
infotext.afflictiondescription.he-hunger.lethal.o: El paciente está comenzando a sufrir inanición.
infotext.afflictiondescription.he-halucinova.self: Sientes que estás viajando a otro plano existencial.
infotext.afflictiondescription.he-halucinova.othe: El paciente está claramente fuera de sí.
infotext.afflictiondescription.he-thirst.other.lo: El paciente está empezando a sentir sed.
infotext.afflictiondescription.he-thirst.lethal.o: El paciente está muriendo de sed.
infotext.afflictiondescription.he-starvation.othe: El paciente se muere de hambre.
infotext.afflictiondescription.he-dieofthirst.oth: El paciente está muriendo de sed.
infotext.afflictiondescription.he-increasedmeleed: Haces un 15% más de daño cuerpo a cuerpo.
infotext.afflictiondescription.he-alcoholism: El paciente está risueño... siempre que tenga lo que necesita.
infotext.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-al: ¡Es la hora feliz! Te voliste adicto al alcohol.
infotext.afflictiondescription.he-alcoholwithdraw: La agitación y temblores son obvios, así como los signos de nausea.
infotext.afflictioncauseofdeathself.he-alcoholwit: Has muerto por abstinencia de alcohol.
infotext.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-al: ¡Sientes que es hora de abrir una fresca para la banda!
infotext.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: El paciente muestra señales de abstinencia al aclohol.
infotext.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-al: Una cerveza fria o una botella de ron... ¡Lo que sea para calmar esta sed por alcohol!
infotext.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: El paciente muestra serias señales de abstinencia por alcohol.
infotext.afflictiondescription.he-drunkinvertcont: Arriba es abajo e izquierda es... ¿Derecha? ¿Dónde estoy?
infotext.afflictioncauseofdeathself.he-stuffed: Te has ahogado con tu propio vómito.
infotext.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-st: El estómago está a su límite. Comer más hará que vomites.
El estómago está muy lleno. Sientes que vas a vomitar.
infotext.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: El estómago está lleno. El paciente ha comido suficiente.
El estómago está lleno. El paciente casi come de más.
El estómago está muy lleno. El paciente puede vomitar.
infotext.afflictioncauseofdeathself.he-stomachach: Te has ahogado en tu propio vómito.
infotext.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-st: Te duele el estómago y te sientes ligeralmente nauseabundo.
El estómago duele mucho y te sientes muchas nauseas.
infotext.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: El paciente tiene dolores de estómago por tomar mucha agua marina.
infotext.afflictiondescription.he-butchered: El cuerpo ha sido descuartizado por su carne.
infotext.afflictiondescription.he-halucinova: Sientes que estás en otro plano existencial.
infotext.talentdescription.he-hungryeuropan: Eres un europano hambriento, necesitas beber y comer regularmente.
infotext.entitydescription.plantcluster: A cluster of entangled plants. It might be possible to untangle them when stabilizing them with stabilozine at a research table.
infotext.entitydescription.plantclusterresearched: A cluster of entangled plants. It has been stabilized and can be untangled without harming all of the plants.
infotext.missiondescription.cotakeover_separatist: A garrison of separatist rebels is staying at [location1]. Eliminate them and seize the outpost for the Coalition.
infotext.missiondescription.septakeover_coalition: A garrison of coalition soldiers is staying at [location1]. Eliminate them and liberate the outpost in the name the Separatists.
infotext.missionmessage0.coalitiontakeover: Seems like the separatists are surrendering.
infotext.missionmessage0.separatisttakeover: Seems like the coalition is giving this station up.
infotext.eventtext.gettakeovermission.option.acce: "Thank you! Some backup is always appreciated!"
"That won't be necessary. Please order your soldiers to stay."
"You seem quite determined... Alright, I'll order them to stay put. Good luck!"
infotext.EventText.mine.terminal.interact: The door is shut. The terminal says: "All external contractors must pay a security deposit of 250mk to access mining operations"
infotext.EventText.mine.breakin: You broke into the mine without paying the fee. Authorities were notified about your actions.
infotext.afflictiondescription.temporarycrew.othe: Will leave your crew after 6 hours from the moment they joined.
infotext.afflictiondescription.temporarycrew.self: I'm here to support this crew for 6 hours from the moment I arrived. No more, no less.
infotext.EventText.jailbreak_husk.c1: “Praise the Husk. We thought we'd never be getting out of here!”
infotext.huskterroristannounce: The depths will take the unbelievers!
Those who reject the gift must drown!
Perish and be reborn as Husk!
infotext.EventText.missionevent_beaconhusk.quest: "This vessel is yours, correct? We lost contact with a nearby deep sea laboratory. The research team is supposed to send us a weekly detailed report, but now they do not respond to our calls. See if you can reestablish communication, the church will reward you accordingly."
infotext.EventText.beaconhusk.transducerbroken: No signal... Maybe check the antenna?
infotext.EventText.beaconhusk.poweronline: The power is back online. The structure rumbles as machinery comes alive.
infotext.EventText.beaconhusk.savedresearcher: The researcher coughs up an unnerving amount of fluids before catching his breath in a gasp. \n"Praise the husk you came! It seems you're not from the church..."
infotext.EventText.beaconhusk.whathappened: "You were on the verge of turning, what happened here?"
infotext.EventText.beaconhusk.taintedgenes: "It's the genes we were using. Usually the church directly provides us with a fresh supply, but for the last shipment, we had to rely on a delivery from an outsider ship. Those infidels must've tampered with the product, trying to make a profit by reselling the rest."
infotext.EventText.beaconhusk.whynotransform: "But why didn't the parasite take over?"
infotext.EventText.beaconhusk.explanation: "We put the symbiote in stasis by spreading chlorine through the ventilation system and shut the whole circuit down, it's a standard safety procedure in case of outbreak... We tried signaling the church, but nobody came, until you did."
infotext.EventText.beaconhusk.reward: "Bastards must have sabotaged it! I'll send a full report to the church... And bless your travels."
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.thisisthe: This is the place. The clown could be anywhere. Don't forget to honk your horn.
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.psstoverh: You suddenly hear a muffled voice calling out for you. "Pssst! Over here!"
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.trashfoun: As you approach, an orange wig emerges from under the garbage. "Thank the honkmother! Did my troupe sent you?"
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.whyintras: "What are you even doing in there?"
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.hidingobi: "Hiding, obviously. At first I thought sharing a few jokes incognito would lighten up the mood, you know, get those sinister fellows on the sillier side of life. But as soon as I snuck into the outpost, my cover was blown! Can you believe it?"
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.unbelieva: "I find the very concept of clowns unbelievable to begin with."
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.studiedhu: The clown grumbles. "I spent weeks mastering the art of subterfuge to blend into the cult, and even read all of their honkin' lore, chalice, wine and all..."
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.pullnose: "Should I pull you out by the nose?"
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.cantgetou: "No way, if I get seen, they'll get their grabby appendices on me and strap me to a dissection table! You can't open up a clown, that's like explaining a joke, it's not funny!"
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.timetoneg: "Great! I've got a few jokes if you need an ice-breaker. So, a cultist, a clown and a separatist walk into a bar..." You close the lid. Time to negociate.
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.sternsecu: "This particularly stern cultist looks like the head of security."
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.lookingfo: "The cultist sighs. Ah... so you've heard about our unwanted guest. We've been looking to oust this intruder, but the trickster has eluded us.?"
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.nofanofcl: "Not a big fan of clowns are you?"
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.clownsnot: "Disruptions are not to be tolerated in this holy sanctuary. Xenoscience is not some trivial matter. It requires a honed mind, focused on the most noble goal of bettering humanity. None shall make a mockery of our precepts."
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.allowclow: "Let's say I can convince the clown to leave the station for good, will you allow it?"
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.fineclown: "Fine. We just want our peace of mind. Rid us of this disturbance and we will overlook the situation."
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.clownleav: "Some fresh air at last!" The clown clumsily squeezes out of the trash can, like a human-shaped sausage.
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.smellyclo: The inept infiltrator is emanating a foul stench from days spent in hiding. "Please don't tell my troupe, I don't want to be the butt of the joke!"
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.joinsthec: "Great! I might not be the most subtle of jesters, but I know my way around a submarine."
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.laughatyo: "You need to learn to laugh about yourself. It's part of the clown spirit."
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.clowngrat: "You're right. There's nothing to be ashamed of. I'll call my friends and wait for a shuttle to bring me back." The clown bows and pinches its large red nose as a sign of gratitude.
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.seennoclo: "Oh well. Not that I've seen clowns around here, no sir."
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.dontbothe: "Then don't bother me!". They don't need to know about the clown, you need to think of another way.
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.escapepla: "This place gives me the creeps." The clown pauses for a moment, and formulates a plan. "What do you say we play one final prank, a diversion while I make my escape?"
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.givesgren: "Here, I prepared this party cracker." He hands you a... grenade? "Place it inside a cabinet, and when you're ready, honk the horn. It's going to be a blast, trust me!"
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.pathoftri: You find the clown shaking from excitement. "That was some J-grade pranking! To hell with subtelty, take me on a tour around the moon, there are many tricks to be played!"
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.clowncanj: "Sure, just don't blow up the submarine."
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.lurethecl: "The church would greatly appreciate your cooperation. Lure the unbeliever out, and we will take care of the rest."
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.lietoclow: "They loved it. You can come out now."
infotext.EventText.hiddenandclowngerous.clownarre: You hear the head of security over the radio: "The church thanks you for your help. May the tides carry you to your destination". You're not very proud of what you've done, but you accept the reward nonetheless.
infotext.EventText.missionevent_hiddenandclownger: You spot an unusually upset clown. Despite its colorful appearance, it seems worried about something.
"What's the matter? Stepped on a rake lately?"
"Believe it or not, this is no laughing matter. I could use some help from a crew like yours."

"Two days ago, a member of our troupe thought it'd be a good idea to board a shuttle to a nearby church, and we havent heard about him since. Our friend believed he could infiltrate the church, and pass himself as an adept. Naturally, I thought it was a joke!"
"To us it's fun and games, but to these people the very concept of humor is akin to blasphemy!"
"Didn't know the honkmother had a spy network."
"I thought you guys avoided touring the church."

"We go from station to station, raising morale, that is the mission of our dis-organization. Anyway, take this bike horn with you and go to these coordinates. Once you're there, honk around. Clowns always heed the call, you should be able to find our friend that way."
Let's not get involved in clown business.
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_huskcultintercept: “I believe you're familiar with those creepy husk cultists right? They're not just religious fanatics mind you, the church makes most of the medicine and biotech here on Europa."
infotext.EventText.missionevent_huskcultintercept: "Until we can produce our own on a large scale, we are dependent on their shipments, but so is the coalition...”
“Here's the plan: take down a church transport ship on route to a coalition outpost. This will keep our hands clean while dealing a blow to the coalition”
"I already knew that, what about it?"
infotext.EventText.missionevent_assassinatehuskre: The coalition official waves at you. “Here you are. I've received a report... We have a major problem.”
“Those fanatics of the church are on the verge of a scientific breakthrough: a new pathogen, unlike anything we've seen before. We think they're working on way to spread the virus on a large scale.”

“We need to put an end to this research project. Their scientist must be eliminated. But we can't act on our own, sending one of our own agents would cause not only the Church to retaliate, but also Separatists to take their side. \nI need a freelance crew for this... and you just happen to be here.”
No way. This is too much of a risk.
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_escorthuskterrori: “Some of the commoners here are looking for safe passage to a nearby station. Escort them over there safely and you'll be paid.”
infotext.EventText.missionevent_jailbreak_husk.c1: The Deacon seems distressed. “You know all too well the gospel of the church can be too... enlightening for some. \nThose who spread the good word are never safe from bigotry and suspicion.”
infotext.EventText.missionevent_jailbreak_husk.o1: “A few proselytes are being unjustly detained in an outpost nearby. Free them from the jaws of intolerance and the Church will reward you.”
“An epidemic broke out in a nearby outpost. \nDeliver these medical supplies and spread the good word of the church.”
“We need to spread the good faith, but the unbelievers are wary of our gifts. \nSmuggle these goods to our proselyte brothers in hiding.”
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_escorthuskvip.c1: “A Cardinal is looking for transport to a nearby research laboratory”
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_slimecollection.c: “I've heard the church of the Husk is looking to develop a new vaccine. \nThey will pay good money for fresh samples of slime bacteria.”
infotext.eventtext.openblockade.pathunlocked: You pull the lever and hear the gate rumbling: the passage is open.
infotext.eventtext.blockadealarm.breakin: "Security alert: intruders are trying to force the gate open!"
infotext.eventtext.openblockade.blockade: You've reached a blockade. The path to the next biome must be unlocked to proceed.
infotext.eventtext.openblockade.gotolever: Reach the control room to open the blockade
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_killmonster_regio: “I posted about an assignment earlier. Some fauna exclusive to this region is causing us massive trouble. I've sent all the details to your onboard navigation system, in case you're interested.”
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_piratemission1.c1: “We received multiple reports about a pirate vessel causing trouble. We need you to get rid of them by any means.”
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_piratemission2.c1: “We received multiple reports about a pirate vessel blasting music into the depths and luring more monsters close to our stations. We need you to get rid of them by any means.”
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_piratemission3.c1: “We recently lost contact to some of our vessels. We believe they got attacked by a strange vessel that was reported lurking around these parts. We need you to get rid of it to hopefully prevent other vessels getting lost in the future.”
infotext.eventtext.troubledengine.monitor: The status monitor is displaying a warning about the engine malfunctioning. Better order a mechanic to take a look.
infotext.eventtext.troubledengine.engine: The engine stopped working. Best to quickly get it back up and running.
infotext.eventtext.troubledengine.engine.success: You got the engine back up and running!
infotext.eventtext.troubledengine.engine.failure: The engine didn't start up. Try again?
infotext.eventtext.troubledengine.engine.smack.fa: A part fell off. Surely nothing important... Just give it a bit of time and it'll probably start back up.
infotext.eventtext.option.dontbother: Let someone else deal with this...
infotext.eventtext.reactormalfunction.monitor: The status monitor is displaying a warning about a reactor malfunction. An engineer should probably take a look.
infotext.eventtext.reactormalfunction.reactor: The reactor is malfunctioning and building up pressure. This is a serious issue and should be dealt with immediatly!
infotext.eventtext.reactormalfunction.reactor.suc: You resolved the issue and the reactor is returning to normal values!
infotext.eventtext.reactormalfunction.reactor.fai: You failed to release the pressure. Try again?
infotext.eventtext.reactormalfunction.reactor.sma: A part fell off. Let's hope it's nothing important...
infotext.eventtext.takeover.success: You hear someone tune into your frequency: "Enough! We yield! The station is yours... Just please stop with the bloodshed!". \nLeave the station to receive your reward.
infotext.eventtext.takeover.success.info: Leave the station to receive your reward.
infotext.eventtext.takeover.complete: "Great work! The station is now ours. We'll send some of our people there. It should be back up and running under our command in no time! For now you should leave the station. I'm sending you your reward..."
infotext.eventtext.takeover.attack: "We arrived! Make sure your weapons are loaded and safety is off! Let's do this!". There's no turning back now: You're at war.
infotext.eventtext.gettakeovermission.general.isa: "We still have to take over the last station your crew was sent to before we can plan an attack on the next one."
infotext.eventtext.gettakeovermission.coalition.h: "Ah good to see you! Your crew is doing great! We planned another attack. Would your crew mind lending a hand at taking over another separatist station nearby?"
infotext.eventtext.gettakeovermission.coalition.m: "Since your crew is doing good, we'd like to ask if your crew could aid us in another attack on a separatist station nearby?"
infotext.eventtext.gettakeovermission.coalition.l: "We have noticed your efforts to maintain a good reputation with us and would like to give your crew a chance to prove you're serious with us. Aid us in an attack on a separatist station nearby and you'll be working with our top men soon enough!"
infotext.eventtext.gettakeovermission.separatists: "Ah good to see you! Your crew is doing great! We planned another attack. Would your crew mind lending a hand at taking over another coalition station nearby?"
"Since your crew is doing good, we'd like to ask if your crew could aid us in another attack on a coalition station nearby?"

"We have noticed your efforts to maintain a good reputation with us and would like to give your crew a chance to prove you're serious with us. Aid us in an attack on a coalition station nearby and you'll be working with our top men soon enough!"
infotext.eventtext.gettakeovermission.option.acce: "Yes we would like to help. Which station is our target?"
"Here, I'll mark it on your map... We've also ordered some of our soldiers to assist you and your crew during the attack. They'll be joining you in just a moment."
infotext.eventtext.gettakeovermission.option.decl: "Sorry, but we currently got other business to take care of first."
"Alright. Let me know when you dealt with your business or if you change your mind."
infotext.eventtext.piratemissionbroadcast.receive: "Yarhahar, what do we have here? Me eyes spied some good loot! Hope ye came prepared..."
infotext.eventtext.cocargobroadcast.receive: You're receiving a transmission from another vessel. What do you want to do?
infotext.eventtext.cocargobroadcast.receive.accep: "This is CO-CT-43. State your business in this area immediately!"
(Tell the truth) "We're here to rob you obviously... Get ready to be boarded!"
"At least your honest... *EVERYONE GET TO YOUR STATIONS! WE GOT HOSTILES INCOMING*"
(Tell a lie) "We have official orders from Admiral Edward to check your cargo for potential stowaways. Please cooperate with us and stop your submarine."
"Oh Admiral Edward? Yes we'll stop our vessel immediately! Welcome on board!"
"How stupid do you think we are? There is no Admiral Edward! Whoever you are, we suggest to turn around and get out of our way or face the consequences."
"Can't afford our hospitality huh? Don't worry, I'll give you the royal treatment!"
infotext.eventtext.piratearmorylocked.doorlocked: You try pressing the button, but the door seems locked. You can hear a raspy voice from the other side: \n"Should've paid, the toll, chump. But if you REALLY want in... we can find an arrangement..."
infotext.eventtext.piratearmorylocked.nomoney: "Trying to swindle me? No cash, no guns."
infotext.eventtext.piratearmorylocked.comeback: "Hah! Come back if you change your mind. I'm not going anywhere."
infotext.eventtext.piratearmoryalarm.breakin: "This guy's trying to steal our supplies!"
infotext.eventtext.piratediversoutpost.meetambush: As you walk down the hallway, an unsavory individual puts a hand on your shoulder. "Fancy ship you've got there. A real beauty... Bet it cost you a little fortune."
infotext.eventtext.piratediversoutpost.agree: It's just a hunk of junk.
infotext.eventtext.piratediversoutpost.Iwascaptai: The man keeps following you. "Used to be a captain you know? Mine was sunk by one of those coalition dogs. Tried to run a blockade with a shipment of the good stuff, turns out Dugongs aren't known for their speed."

The self-proclaimed pilot spits on the floor. "Took a straight hit by a railgun. Tore a hole in the amidships, but somehow me and my crew limped back to this rat hole of a station. Bet if I had yours, things would've been different..."
infotext.eventtext.piratediversoutpost.goodluck: Tough luck mate, I wish you the best.
infotext.eventtext.piratediversoutpost.offersbooz: The involuntary landlubber is back again, and pulls something from under his coat. For a brief moment you think it's a gun, but it's just a bottle of rum. "You know what, I've got a good feeling business will resume. Pulled these babies from my personal stash. This one is on the house!"
infotext.eventtext.piratediversoutpost.takebooze: Never say no to free booze.
infotext.eventtext.piratediversoutpost.getthehell: Get the hell off me. You're not my buddy, pal.
infotext.eventtext.piratediversoutpost.drinkup: Drink up, and make sure to share with aaaaall your crew! To the last drop. Me, I won't be staying here for long..." \nYou catch a glimpse of a sinister chuckle.
infotext.eventtext.piratediversoutpost.dontgetalo: "Whatever. Guess we just don't get along. Don't worry, I'll be leaving soon..."
infotext.eventtext.piratediversoutpost.soundinair: There's a loud sound in the airlock...
infotext.eventtext.piratemissioninformant.interac: "Hm? Ye lookin' for work ye say? Lemme tell ya somethin'! Ain't no administration service here! But... Got me a lead about a coalition transport passing near here and I'm not sure if me crew is ready for it. Imma sell it to ya if ye got the cash!"
"Hah great! Lemme show ya where they gonna pass!"
"Ain't gonna give it to ya for free dumbass! Come back when ye got the scratch!"
infotext.EventText.DEgotoblockade.c1: "COALITION BOUNTY ISSUED", the discolored and damaged posters list off sites of destruction and infestation, seems like the coalition is in over their heads. You can only make out one set of coordinates.
infotext.EventText.DEgotoblockade.o1: A tax free paycheck couldn't hurt...
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_lair.c1: “There is a massive lair nearby bubbling over with more and more creatures by the minute, if you can take it out there is a reward in it for you!”
infotext.eventtext.survey.interact: This automated station scans the surrounding area for minerals. A message is displayed on the terminal: \n\n"PAY 1000MK TO ACCESS THIS UNIT'S SCANNING DATABASE"
infotext.eventtext.survey.givemissions: "ACCESS GRANTED. POTENTIAL MINERAL DEPOSITS CAN BE FOUND AT THESE LOCATIONS..."
infotext.eventtext.constructionrecipe.recipe:
A panel displays a message from the outpost's taskmaster. 

"CONSTRUCTION UNITS REQUESTED. MAY BE FABRICATED AND PACKAGED USING THE FOLLOWING MATERIALS:" 

-Lead 
-Copper 
-Steel 
-Iron 
-Zinc 
-Aluminium
infotext.eventtext.Constructionprogress.starterdi: "Hey you! We're running short on materials and the next delivery has been delayed a few days. We don't want to spend more time on this construction site than we have to... You don't happen to have 5 crates of building materials you could spare? We'll pay for them of course!"
infotext.eventtext.Constructionprogress.wehavecra: We do. Let me go grab them for you.
infotext.eventtext.Constructionprogress.speaktome: "Oh wonderful! Speak to me again once you're done delivering them to the cargo unit over there to collect your payment."
infotext.eventtext.Constructionprogress.letmechec: I am not sure. Let me check our cargo first.
infotext.eventtext.Constructionprogress.ifyoufind: "Alright! If you happen to find some, deliver them to the cargo unit over there and talk to me once you're done."
infotext.eventtext.Constructionprogress.findmeaga: "I see... Well if you happen to change your mind, you know where to find me."
infotext.eventtext.Constructionprogress.wellwait: "I see... Well then I guess we'll have to wait for the official delivery then."
infotext.eventtext.Constructionprogress.changeyou: "Oh hey! Did you guys change your mind? We really could use those 5 crates of building materials!"
infotext.eventtext.Constructionprogress.cratescom: Yes, the crates are on their way.
infotext.eventtext.Constructionprogress.cratesdel: "I see you've delivered the required amount. Here's your payment!"
infotext.eventtext.Constructionprogress.youdecide: "Oh and since you're on good terms with us, administration stated to throw the current building plans out and let you decide on what type of station we should build here. So what's it going to be, boss?"
infotext.eventtext.Constructionprogress.settlemen: "Alright, a settlement it is. I'll be returning to work now. Safe travels to you!"
infotext.eventtext.Constructionprogress.basepicke: "Alright, a military base it is. I'll be returning to work now. Safe travels to you!"
infotext.eventtext.Constructionprogress.researchp: "Alright, a research station it is. I'll be returning to work now. Safe travels to you!"
infotext.eventtext.Constructionprogress.hospitalp: "Alright, a hospital it is. I'll be returning to work now. Safe travels to you!"
infotext.eventtext.Constructionprogress.backtowor: "I'll be returning to work now. Safe travels to you!"
infotext.eventtext.Constructionprogress.notenough: "I'm afraid that won't be enough. Check your cargo hold and see if can find some more."
infotext.eventtext.Constructionprogress.allwegot: Sorry, but that's all we got...
infotext.eventtext.Constructionprogress.takecargo: "In that case I recommend taking your cargo back. We'll be waiting on the official delivery then instead."
infotext.faction.bandits.description: Gangs of outlaws that roam the murky seas of Europa and engage in criminal activities. Dangerous, but open for business...
infotext.faction.bandits.shortdescription: Opportunists, brigands, pirates... Truly a villainous bunch.
infotext.entitydescription.cultistrobeshoodless: A dark garment traditionally worn by acolytes of the Church of Husk. Imbued with pheromones that pacify feral husks, helping the acolytes stay safe until they're ready to ascend.
infotext.entitydescription.huskchalice: A decorated Chalice used in ascension rituals.
infotext.entitydescription.de_nuclearbomb: A nuclear bomb, causing a massive fallout after detonation, killing everything in its path. 60 seconds until detonation when armed.
infotext.entitydescription.constructionmaterialcr: A crate full of processed construction materials. Can be delivered to construction sites.
infotext.locationchange.construction.changeto.non: Construction work at [name] was stopped due to nearby dangers.
Ongoing constructions at [name] were abandoned due to nearby dangers.
The construction site at [name] was closed down and abandoned due to nearby dangers.
infotext.locationdescription.huskchurch: A scientific outpost of the Church of Husk.
infotext.locationchange.circus.changeto.none: The Sinking Circus has left the area.
infotext.locationchange.none.changeto.circus: The Sinking Circus has arrived in [previousname].
infotext.locationdescription.sinkingcircus: Entertainers, travelling the cold seas of Europa.
infotext.missiondescription.gotoclownhuskoperativ: Rescue a clown from a church outpost.
infotext.missionsuccess.gotoclownhuskoperative: A naive clown left his troupe and attempted to infiltrate [location1]. Investigate the situation.
infotext.missiondescription.huskcultinterception: Prevent a delivery of medical supplies to a coalition outpost. Intercept the church's transport ship.
infotext.missionmessage0.huskcultinterception: Neutralize the crew or sink the submarine to the bottom of the sea!
infotext.missionmessage1.huskcultinterception: Navigate the submarine to [location2] to claim your reward.
infotext.missionfailure.huskcultinterception: The shipment has not been intercepted.
infotext.missionmessage0.huskcultinterception: The cult's scientist has been successfully eliminated. Leave the outpost at once complete the mission.
infotext.missiondescription.huskcultattack1: Seek out the Jovian Separatist vessel that has been terrorizing this area and eliminate its crew. The marked locations show where the ship has last been sighted.
infotext.missionmessage0.huskcultattack1: “Your transgressions against our church will no longer be tolerated. May you find mercy into the depths!”
infotext.missiondescription.assassinatehuskresear: An informant in the [location1] has told us a leading scientist of the church has been developping a devastating bioweapon prototype there. Kill the target and put an end to their research.
infotext.missionsuccess.assassinatehuskresearcher: The cult's scientist has been successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.assassinatehuskresearche: The cult's scientist has been successfully eliminated. Leave the outpost at once complete the mission.
infotext.missiondescription.escorthuskterrorist: Escort a number of personnel from [location1] to [location2] while ensuring their safety.
infotext.missionsuccess.escorthuskterrorist: Personnel transport successful, and the extremists have been dealt with.
infotext.missionfailure.escorthuskterrorist: Escorted personnel did not reach their destination, or the extremists were not uncovered and neutralized.
infotext.missionmessage0.escorthuskterrorist: Too many of the escorted personnel have perished at sea. The mission is a failure.
infotext.missionmessage1.escorthuskterrorist: Looks like that was the last of the extremists. Check on your crew and reach [location2].
infotext.missiondescription.jailbreak_husk: The Church of Husk has tasked you to free some of their proselytes who are being held captive.
infotext.missiondescription.huskmedicalcargo: [location2] is in dire need of medical supplies, and the church has tasked you with the delivery.
infotext.missionsuccess.huskmedicalcargo: The medical supplies have been delivered.
infotext.missionfailure.huskmedicalcargo: The supplies have not been delivered.
infotext.missiondescription.huskeggsmuggling: The church wants you to smuggle husk eggs hidden among other medical supplies to their operatives in [location2].
infotext.missionsuccess.huskeggsmuggling: The calyx extract has been delivered.
infotext.missionfailure.huskeggsmuggling: The supplies have not been delivered.
infotext.missiondescription.escorthuskvip: One of the church's researchers must be transfered to the [location2]. Ensure their safety.
infotext.missionfailure.escorthuskvip: Escorted personnel did not reach their destination.
infotext.missiondescription.slimecollection: The church of husk will pay [reward] for samples of slime bacteria. Harvest and deliver them to the [location2].
infotext.missionmessage0.slimecollection: Enough slime samples have been harvested. Head to the outpost for your reward.
infotext.missionsuccess.slimecollection: All the samples have been delivered.
infotext.missionfailure.slimecollection: You did not deliver the samples.
infotext.missiondescription.destroylair: Monsters have nested deeply into [location1] and are now spreading in the surrounding areas. Plant a nuclear device inside and blow up the place once and for all.
infotext.missionsuccess.destroylair: The lair has been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.destroylair: The lair has been destroyed. A reward will be sent by the nearby authorities.
infotext.eventtext.destroylair.reachheart: Reach the heart of the lair with the bomb
infotext.eventtext.destroylair.plantbomb: Plant the bomb near the heart
infotext.missiondescription.crawlerlair1: Crawlers are nesting at [location1]. Help us to get rid of them by finding and destroying any of their eggs inside the cave.
infotext.missionsuccess.crawlerlair1: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.crawlerlair1: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."
infotext.missiondescription.crawlerlair2: Crawlers are nesting at [location1]. Help us to get rid of them by finding and destroying any of their eggs inside the cave.
infotext.missionsuccess.crawlerlair2: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.crawlerlair2: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."

infotext.missionsuccess.crawlerlair3: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.crawlerlair3: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."

infotext.missionsuccess.mudraptorlair1: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.mudraptorlair1: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."

infotext.missionsuccess.mudraptorlair2: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.mudraptorlair2: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."

infotext.missionsuccess.mudraptorlair3: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.mudraptorlair3: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."

infotext.missionsuccess.thresherlair1: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.thresherlair1: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."

infotext.missionsuccess.thresherlair2: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.thresherlair2: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."
infotext.missiondescription.thresherlair3: Threshers are nesting at [location1]. Help us to get rid of them by finding and destroying any of their eggs inside the cave.
infotext.missionsuccess.thresherlair3: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.thresherlair3: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."
infotext.missiondescription.huskcrawlerlair: Husked Crawlers are spreading rapidly at [location1]. We can't let this spread further! Help us to get rid of them by eliminating every single one you can find in that cave! We've sent you something to help deal with them, check your cargo. Better place that bad boy far away!
infotext.missionsuccess.huskcrawlerlair: The husked crawlers have been successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.huskcrawlerlair: "Wow good job! Seems like you succesfully killed every single one of them in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."
infotext.missiondescription.surveyedminerals: The survey outpost has located [resourcename1] and [resourcename2] on the way to [location2].
infotext.missionmessage0.surveyedminerals: That should be all of the surveyed minerals.
infotext.missionsuccess.surveyedminerals: You have mined all of the [resourcename1] and [resourcename2] deposits.
infotext.talentdescription.knowledgefrombeyond: Her dedication to her research has given her the knowledge to use alien materials to craft dementonite tools.
infotext.talentdescription.stayingtipsy: You provided her with alcohol, now live with the consequences.
infotext.eventtext.pantytheft.opportunity: A suspicious figure speaks quietly: "I've heard of you. And I know you take odd jobs. Can I interest you in a most lucrative opportunity?"
infotext.eventtext.pantytheft.confidentiality: "See, people come and go around these outposts, but nobody knows when and where. That's captain confidentiality."
infotext.eventtext.pantytheft.plantingtags: "Well me and my partners all over Europa came up with a little system. We plant tags in the clothes, and with a simple scanner in the airlock, we know exactly who docks and who leaves. Then we then sell the information to whoever needs it. Separatist dissidents, coalition bigwigs, juicy merchants... you name em, we find em. That's where you help."
infotext.eventtext.pantytheft.grabclothes: "I can't be seen rummaging around the crew quarters, so you're up to the job. Grab a bunch of clothes from the lockers, and bring them to me in that bag. I'll do my thing and put them right back in."
infotext.eventtext.pantytheft.clothesdelivered: "Perfect. I'll get to work. Remember: We never spoke."
infotext.eventtext.vendingsmashing.quickcash: A disheveled individual whispers: "Hey, looking for a bit of quick cash?"
infotext.eventtext.vendingsmashing.machinetrick: "Those vending machines man, they're a scam. But I know a trick to make them spill their insides."
infotext.eventtext.vendingsmashing.hitemhard: "Hit em as hard as you can. That'll attract the attention"
infotext.eventtext.vendingsmashing.Ilootyourun: "Yeah that's why you do the smashing and I do the looting. Keep security busy while I grab the goods. Now get to work." He hands you a crowbar.
infotext.eventtext.vendingsmashing.readycrowbar: That one looks full. Ready your crowbar...
infotext.eventtext.vendingsmashing.Ilootyourun: "Yeah that's why you do the smashing and I do the looting. Keep security busy while I grab the goods. Now get to work."
infotext.eventtext.circuswelcome.foundus: "You found us! A warm welcome to our guests."
infotext.missiondescription.vipnapping: A wealthy executive is conducting business in [location1]. Drag him to your submarine alive and escape the station.
infotext.eventtext.escortransom.findbeacon: Drop off the VIP at a beacon station. Alive.
infotext.eventtext.vipnapping.thatstarget: "Fancy clothes, expensive watch... That's the target."
infotext.missiondescription.destroypirateoutpost: This place is a den of thieves. You're free to conduct business... but you could also rid Europa of this scum.
infotext.missionsuccess.destroypirateoutpost: You cleared the outpost of its undesirable inhabitants. Europa is a safer place now.
infotext.missionfailure.destroypirateoutpost: The pirates still remain in control of the outpost.
infotext.missionmessage0.destroypirateoutpost: You cleared the outpost of its undesirable inhabitants. Europa is a safer place now.
infotext.eventtext.piratehavenalarm.breakin: "These guys are trying to break in! Get 'em!"
